sentences.en: Added Negate First Strike ability to Air Elementals.
sentences.cn: 为气元素增加抗先攻特技.

sentences.en: Efforts to expand the tourist industry could be negated by reports that the sea is highly polluted.
sentences.cn: 有关海洋受到严重污染的报道可能会使拓展旅游业的努力完全白费。

sentences.en: He warned that to negate the results of elections would only make things worse.
sentences.cn: 他警告说，否定选举的结果只会使事情更糟。
你怎麽能否定上帝的存在?

sentences.en: However, virtually all present - day sedatives suppress REM, while Inception's designer drugs also negate real REM effects.
sentences.cn: 然而, 几乎所有现有的镇静剂都会抑制REM, 而《造梦空间》中的特制药物也抵消了真正的REM的作用.

sentences.en: I think, Nietzsche did not reject science and not negate rationality completely.
sentences.cn: 本文认为, 尼采并不拒绝科学,也不完全否定理性.

sentences.en: It is revisionism to negate the basic principles of Marxism and to negate its universal truth.
sentences.cn: 否定马克思主义的基本原则,否定马克思主义的普遍真理,这就是修正主义.

sentences.en: It is wrong to ban religion with administrative means and absolutely negate its death away.
sentences.cn: 用行政的手段取缔宗教和断然否定宗教的消亡都是错误的.

sentences.en: Mass advertising could negate the classical theory of supply and demand.
sentences.cn: 大宗广告可以否定古典经济学的供求理论.

sentences.en: Our actions often negate our principles.
sentences.cn: 我们的行为时常与我们所信奉的原则背道而弛.

sentences.en: The facts negate what he said.
The target can make a Will save to negate the effect.
sentences.cn: 目标若通过意志豁免则忽略此效果.

sentences.en: Therefore, it exaggerates to affirm or negate that all paintings can reflect spirit of times.
sentences.cn: 因此, 肯定或否定一切绘画都能表现时代精神,都是言之过甚.
这些事实否定了你的理论.

sentences.en: They are under pressure to negate their femaleness.
sentences.cn: 她们承受着否认自己女性身份的压力。

sentences.en: This action will negate the effect of my efforts.
sentences.cn: 这种行动将会冲淡我的努力带来的效果.

words.tran_cn: [数] 负的；消极的；否定的；阴性的
否定论；消极论；反对癖性

trans.tran_en: to state that something does not exist or is untrue

trans.tran_cn: 取消，使无效，否定，否认，使作废
trans.tran_en: to prevent something from having any effect
